verses.verse: וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <S%H6950><s%> assembled together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> And the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> at Shiloh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ינוּ <S%H7931><s%> and set up שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> there And the land נִכְבְּשָׁ֖ה <S%H3533><s%> was subdued לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַיִּוָּֽתְרוּ֙ <S%H3498><s%> And there remained בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not חָלְק֖וּ <S%H2505><s%> which had not yet received אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> their inheritance שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> seven שְׁבָטִֽים׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribes

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֙נָה֙ <S%H575><s%> How אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> will you מִתְרַפִּ֔ים <S%H7503><s%> How long [are] ye slack לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> to go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לָכֶ֔ם יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of your fathers

הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> Give out לָכֶ֛ם שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> from among you three אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men לַשָּׁ֑בֶט <S%H7626><s%> for [each] tribe וְאֶשְׁלָחֵ֗ם <S%H7971><s%> and I will send וְיָקֻ֜מוּ <S%H6965><s%> them and they shall rise וְיִֽתְהַלְּכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go בָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the land וְיִכְתְּב֥וּ <S%H3789><s%> and describe אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> it according נַֽחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> to the inheritance וְיָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> of them and they shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְהִֽתְחַלְּק֥וּ <S%H2505><s%> And they shall divide אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> it into seven חֲלָקִ֑ים <S%H2506><s%> parts יְהוּדָ֞ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah יַעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> shall abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גְּבוּלוֹ֙ <S%H1366><s%> in their coast מִנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> on the south וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph יַעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> shall abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in גְּבוּלָ֖ם <S%H1366><s%> in their coasts מִצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> on the north

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> You תִּכְתְּב֤וּ <S%H3789><s%> Ye shall therefore describe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the land שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> [into] seven חֲלָקִ֔ים <S%H2506><s%> parts וַֽהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> and bring אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וְיָרִ֨יתִי <S%H3384><s%> [the description] hither to me that I may cast לָכֶ֤ם גּוֹרָל֙ <S%H1486><s%> lots פֹּ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> here לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> for you here before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have חֵ֤לֶק <S%H2506><s%> have no part לַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> But the Levites בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because כְהֻנַּ֥ת <S%H3550><s%> you for the priesthood יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <S%H5159><s%> [is] their inheritance וְגָ֡ד <S%H1410><s%> and Gad וּרְאוּבֵ֡ן <S%H7205><s%> and Reuben וַחֲצִי֩ <S%H2677><s%> and half שֵׁ֨בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <S%H5159><s%> their inheritance מֵעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond לַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> on the east אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֔ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <S%H6965><s%> arose הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> And the men וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> them that went וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> charged יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַהֹלְכִים֩ <S%H1980><s%> and walk לִכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> to describe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְ֠כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְהִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> and walk בָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> through the land וְכִתְב֤וּ <S%H3789><s%> and describe אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> it and come again אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> for וּ֠פֹה <S%H6311><s%> here אַשְׁלִ֨יךְ <S%H7993><s%> to me that I may here cast לָכֶ֥ם גּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> lots לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for you before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh

וַיֵּלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> went הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> And the men וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> and passed through בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַיִּכְתְּב֧וּהָ <S%H3789><s%> and described לֶֽעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> it by cities לְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> into seven חֲלָקִ֖ים <S%H2506><s%> parts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֑פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in a book וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> [again] to Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> to the host שִׁלֹֽה׃ <S%H7887><s%> at Shiloh

וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֩ <S%H7993><s%> cast לָהֶ֨ם יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua גּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> lots בְּשִׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> for them in Shiloh לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיְחַלֶּק־ <S%H2505><s%> divided שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> and there יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> and there Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4256><s%> according to their divisions פ

וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up גּוֹרַ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> And the lot מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> came forth גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the coast גּֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <S%H1486><s%> of their lot בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> between the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֧ם הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> And their border לִפְאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> on the north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> was from הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> was from Jordan וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> went up הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> to the side יְרִיח֜וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho מִצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north וְעָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> side and went up בָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> through the mountains יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) תֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out מִדְבַּ֖רָה <S%H4057><s%> thereof were at the wilderness בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H1007><s%> of Bethaven

וְעָבַר֩ <S%H5674><s%> went over מִשָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> there הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border ל֗וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> from thence toward Luz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> to the side ל֙וּזָה֙ <S%H3870><s%> of Luz נֶ֔גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> which [is] Bethel וְיָרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> descended הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border עַטְר֣וֹת אַדָּ֔ר <S%H5853><s%> to Atarothadar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> near הָהָ֕ר <S%H2022><s%> near the hill אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which מִנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> that [lieth] on the south side לְבֵית־ חֹר֖וֹן <S%H1032><s%> Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <S%H8481><s%> of the nether

וְתָאַ֣ר <S%H8388><s%> was drawn הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> And the border וְנָסַ֨ב <S%H5437><s%> [thence] and compassed לִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> the corner יָ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea נֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> from the hill אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [lieth] before בֵית־ חֹרוֹן֮ <S%H1032><s%> Bethhoron נֶגְבָּה֒ <S%H5045><s%> southward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) תֹֽצְאֹתָ֗יו <S%H8444><s%> and the goings out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קִרְיַת־ בַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H7154><s%> thereof were at Kirjathbaal הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> he קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <S%H7157><s%> which [is] Kirjathjearim עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> a city בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> quarter יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> this [was] the west

וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> quarter נֶ֕גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> And the south מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> [was] from the end קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֑ים <S%H7157><s%> of Kirjathjearim וְיָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> went out הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> on the west וְיָצָ֕א <S%H3318><s%> and went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַעְיַ֖ן <S%H4599><s%> to the well מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> of waters נֶפְתּֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H5318><s%> of Nephtoah

וְיָרַ֨ד <S%H3381><s%> came down הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> to the end הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> that [lieth] before גֵּ֣י <S%H1516><s%> the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> [and] which [is] in the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <S%H7497><s%> of the giants צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> on the north וְיָרַד֩ <S%H3381><s%> and descended גֵּ֨י <S%H1516><s%> to the valley הִנֹּ֜ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> to the side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> of Jebusi נֶ֔גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> on the south וְיָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> and descended עֵ֥ין רֹגֵֽל׃ <S%H5883><s%> to Enrogel

וְתָאַ֣ר <S%H8388><s%> And was drawn מִצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went forth עֵ֣ין שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H5885><s%> to Enshemesh וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּלִיל֔וֹת <S%H1553><s%> toward Geliloth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נֹ֖כַח <S%H5227><s%> which [is] over against מַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> the going up אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <S%H131><s%> of Adummim וְיָרַ֕ד <S%H3381><s%> and descended אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <S%H932><s%> of Bohan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben

וְעָבַ֛ר <S%H5674><s%> And passed along אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֥תֶף <S%H3802><s%> toward the side מוּל־ <S%H4136><s%> over against הָֽעֲרָבָ֖ה <S%H6160><s%> Arabah צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> northward וְיָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> and went down הָעֲרָבָֽתָה׃ <S%H6160><s%> unto Arabah

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> passed along הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> to the side בֵּית־ חָגְלָה֮ <S%H1031><s%> of Bethhoglah צָפוֹנָה֒ <S%H6828><s%> northward [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ק) [תֹּצְאֹותָיו כ] (תֹּצְאֹ֣ות <S%H8444><s%> plenty ק) הַגְּב֗וּל <S%H1366><s%> of the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about לְשׁ֤וֹן <S%H3956><s%> bay יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <S%H4417><s%> of the salt צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> were at the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> end הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan נֶ֑גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> at the south זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> coast נֶֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> this [was] the south

וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> And Jordan יִגְבֹּל־ <S%H1379><s%> was the border אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> of it on the east זֹ֡את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַת֩ <S%H5159><s%> This [was] the inheritance בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֧ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לִגְבֽוּלֹתֶ֛יהָ <S%H1367><s%> by the coasts סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families

וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> Now the cities לְמַטֵּ֛ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> according to their families יְרִיח֥וֹ <S%H3405><s%> were Jericho וּבֵית־ חָגְלָ֖ה <S%H1031><s%> and Bethhoglah וְעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> and the valley קְצִֽיץ׃ <S%H7104><s%> of Keziz
וּבֵ֧ית הָֽעֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H1026><s%> And Betharabah וּצְמָרַ֖יִם <S%H6787><s%> and Zemaraim וּבֵֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> and Bethel
וְהָעַוִּ֥ים <S%H5761><s%> And Avim וְהַפָּרָ֖ה <S%H6511><s%> and Parah וְעָפְרָֽה׃ <S%H6084><s%> and Ophrah

וּכְפַ֧ר [הָעַמֹּנִי כ] (הָֽעַמֹּנָ֛ה <S%H3726><s%> Chefar-haamonai ק) וְהָֽעָפְנִ֖י <S%H6078><s%> and Ophni וָגָ֑בַע <S%H1387><s%> and Gaba עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> with their villages
גִּבְע֥וֹן <S%H1391><s%> Gibeon וְהָֽרָמָ֖ה <S%H7414><s%> and Ramah וּבְאֵרֽוֹת׃ <S%H881><s%> and Beeroth
וְהַמִּצְפֶּ֥ה <S%H4708><s%> And Mizpeh וְהַכְּפִירָ֖ה <S%H3716><s%> and Chephirah וְהַמֹּצָֽה׃ <S%H4681><s%> and Mozah

וְצֵלַ֡ע <S%H6762><s%> And Zelah הָאֶ֜לֶף <S%H507><s%> Eleph וְהַיְבוּסִ֨י <S%H2983><s%> and Jebusi הִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> he יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> which [is] Jerusalem גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1394><s%> Gibeath קִרְיַ֔ת <S%H7157><s%> [and] Kirjath עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities אַרְבַּֽע־ <S%H702><s%> four עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen וְחַצְרֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H2691><s%> with their villages זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַֽחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> This [is] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> according to their families פ
